Subject: Re: [junit] Unknown Source when assert fails?

From: Paul Michali <pcm@...>

> Paul Harding wrote:
> 
> >     [junit]     at pathfinder.TestPathFinder.testNoFilters(Unknown
> > Source)
> >
> > Anyone know why it is saying "Unknown Source", instead of a
> > line number?
> 
> could be that the code wasn't compiled with debugging info.
> or could be native code.
> or could be JITted code?

Yes, someone else posted about the fact that I must set debug on for the
build of the test sources. That did the trick.

Thanks anyway.
